title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3396/84 of 3 December 1984 revising the list of exceptions referred to in Article 22 (2) (a) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1736/75
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3396/84
of 3 December 1984
revising the list of exceptions referred to in Article 22 (2) (a) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1736/75
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The text of Annex B to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1736/75 is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
